history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04029
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ALLOWING KASAMBAHAYS TO ENJOY DISTANCE LEARNING AND HOME-BASED STUDY PROGRAM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELARO, SALVADOR JR. B.
DATE FILED : 2016-10-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-10-26
          -DepED
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-10-09
      3. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-11-06
      4. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2017-12-04
          -(In substitution of House Bills Numbered 2733, 3292, 3706, 4029, 4307, 4386 and 6039) Introduced by Representatives Gonzales (A.D.), Villarin, Romero, Romualdez, Belaro, Robes, Herrera-Dy, Villafuerte, Durano, Pineda, Violago, Lobregat, Sy-Alvarado, Catamco, Primicias-Agabas, Lazatin, Bravo (M.), Dalipe, Aumentado, Nieto, Belmonte (R.), Malapitan, Escudero, Garcia (J.), Santos-Recto, Go (M.), and Aggabao
      5. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-02-07
      6. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-02-07
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 2733, 3292, 3706, 4029, 4307, 4386, and 6039 was approved with amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB07392
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2016-10-18
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION
